gurmukhi: pr Dn pr qn pr Apvwd bwd bl Cl bMc prpMc hI kmwq hY
transliteration: Par Dhan Par Tan Par Apavaad Baada , Bal Chhal Banch Parapanch Hee Kamaat Hai ?
translation: He who keeps his interest in other person's wife, wealth and who indulges in other's slander, trickery and cheating,

gurmukhi: imqR gur sÍwm dRoh kwm kRoD loB moh gobD bDU ibsÍws bMs ibpR Gwq hY
transliteration: Mitr Gur Svaam Droh Kaam Krodh Lobh Moha , Gobadh Badhoo Bisvaas Bans Bipr Ghaat Hai ?
translation: He who betrays a friend, Guru and master, who is caught in the vices of lust, anger, greed and attachment, who kills cow, woman, cheats, betrays his family and murders Brahmin,

gurmukhi: rog sog huie ibEg Awpdw dirdR iCdR jnmu mrn jm lok ibllwq hY
transliteration: Rog Sog Hui Biaog Aapadaa Daridr Chhidra , Janamu Maran Jam Lok Bilalaat Hai ?
translation: Who is suffering due to various ailments and distresses, who is troubled, lazy and vice-ridden who is caught in the cycle of birth and death and is in the stranglehold of the angels of death,

gurmukhi: kiRqGn ibisK ibiKAwdI koit doKI dIn ADm AsMK mm rom n pujwq hY ]521]
transliteration: Kritaghan Bisikh Bikhiaadee Koti Dokhee Deena , Adham Asankh Mam Rom N Pujaat Hai ?521?
translation: Who is ungrateful, venomous and user of arrow-like sharp words, who is miserable due to countless sins, vices or imperfections; such countless evil-doers cannot match even a hair of my sins. I am many time more evil than them.  (521)
